title: Watch: German President Left Waiting in Hot Sun, Ignored on Arrival in Qatar
description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin this week mocked Germany, saying it is getting pushed around by outside powers and increasingly lacks sovereignty. Putin said Wednesday according to an English translation in state media, “The Germans swallow all this because… they lack sovereignty. And some government leaders apparently lack sufficient professional skills to make adequate and professional decisions. …

title: Saudi: Traveler With Fake Identity Arrested at Jeddah Airport
description:
A traveler with fake identity was arrested by immigration officials at King Abdulaziz International Airport in Jeddah. Saudi Arabia’s General Directorate of Passports (Jawazat) announced on Thursday. title: 113 Companies Booked for ‘Fake Emiratisation’ in UAE
description:
The Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation (MOHRE) has referred 113 private companies to the Public Prosecution for violating Emiratisation decisions. At least 98 private companies were involved in appointing citizens on ‘fake Emiratisation’ posts, and 15 other companies were found involved in circumventing Emiratisation targets. title: Vistara to Launch Direct Flight Service to Doha From Mumbai
description:
Indian full service airline Vistara announced plans to launch a direct flight service to Doha from India’s commercial capital Mumbai. The new service is slated to commence on December 15, the airline said in a media statement. The carrier said it will operate four flights in a week between Doha and Mumbai, using its A321neo aircraft. …

title: EVs Have 80% More Problems Than Traditional Gas Vehicles, Consumer Reports Finds
description:
A new report from Consumer Reports found that electric vehicles have almost 80% more problems and are “generally less reliable” than conventional internal combustion engine cars.  Even worse than electric vehicles were plug-in hybrid electric vehicles, which were found to have 150% more issues than traditional ICE vehicles. Ordinary hybrids are the best of the breed, …
